mapper.select: SELECT c.data as data, c.in_date as inDate FROM municipalities a, locations b, data c, datatypes d WHERE a.id_municipality = b.id_municipality AND b.id_location = c.id_location AND d.id_datatype = c.id_datatype AND a.id_municipality = #{municipioId} AND d.id_datatype = #{tipoDatoId}

SELECT SUM(data.data) as data, m.municipality as municipio, t.type as tipo FROM locations z, municipalities m, departaments d, data, datatypes t WHERE d.id_departament = z.id_departament AND z.id_municipality = m.id_municipality AND z.id_location = data.id_location AND m.id_municipality > 0 AND t.id_datatype = data.id_datatype AND d.id_departament = #{departmentId} GROUP BY m.municipality
SELECT m.id_municipality as idMunicipality, m.municipality as municipality FROM municipalities m
